uk.ac.uea.framework

Interface Orientation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidCompass, AndroidOrientation

    public interface Orientation
    Created by Jack L. Clements on 30/01/2016. Interface designed to implement common set of methods used in orientation/sensors for smartphones Can be used to implement gyroscope, accelerometer, etc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerListener()
      Registers a listener object for changes in input
      void setupSensor()
      Establishes the sensors needed to check
      void unregisterListener()
      Unregisters a listener object so it does not run out of scope
